website_summaries.verdict: A great choice of ceiling heater when you want a jack-of-all-trades light fixture.
pros: Comes as a complete set that includes a small heater, air ventilator, and incandescent light
Sits flush against the ceiling when mounted as a recessed light
Able to fit in small spaces
cons: Heavy to hold up when installing it into the ceiling

customer_reviews.title: it sounds like a helicopter is taking off in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Loud, loud, loud! The new design attaches the heater fan to the air vent. The old design had the units separated and was much quieter. I have been dealing with the noise for over a year. Trying everything I can think of to tweak and adjust so that it does not make so much noise. But it reverts to making noise in short order. Now when I turn on the heater, it sounds like a helicopter is taking off in my bathroom. It has become a quality of life issue. Proceed with caution. If you decide to buy this unit and it makes noise after installation. Return the unit right away!
customer_reviews.author: XNC

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag
customer_reviews.text: Recently had this installed by a professional contractor during a bathroom remodel, and I have mixed feelings about it. PROS Looks very nice; I like the round implementation, and the grill looks good Heater outputs very well; will heat up our bathroom quickly CONS As others have mentioned, the exhaust noise is really loud, especially compared to the Panasonic that I have installed in another bathroom Light leaks out of the seam where the grill meets the ceiling. We had to put special caulk around the seam to stop light bleeding If Broan could solve the exhaust noise issue I'd easily give this a top rating, as the light bleeding out is a minor issue that is easily solved.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Dye

customer_reviews.title: Need heat???
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I got this Fan/Heater/Nightlight/Light.... I wanted a light over the toilet and realized that it was also freezing in the bathroom due to lack of insulation in the home. Turn on the heater and in 10 minutes my bathroom is a lovely sauna - almost. It makes for a pleasant bathing experience. Plus my handyman put everything on it's on seperate switch. The heater is now on a timer and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lavernsviola

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it from Amazon as the warranty is only 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Burnt out the heater after two weeks, Because this was being installed in a remodel Amazon won't warranty after 30 days, It took that long to finish the ducts , plaster and paint and tile work install custom shower. Then two weeks after we got done the heater stopped working and It will cost $80 just for the replacement part. Hmm I think I'll go to Home depot next time
customer_reviews.author: John Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: If I had a chance to do over, I wouldn't buy
customer_reviews.text: Major complaints - for the price, I expected a quieter fan, a warmer heater, and a more convenient way to change the light bulbs. This unit was completely installed when I found out that to change the nightlight, I would need a ladder, and a screwdriver to pull out the entire plate from the ceiling and then try to hold it up with one hand while screwing it in again - all over my head. Ridiculous. So disappointed with NuTone.
customer_reviews.author: Wyo Jean

customer_reviews.title: 9093WH is a replacement for older Nutone 9093N bathroom, fan, light, heater
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by Broan-Nutone customer support as a direct form/fit replacement for a 30+ (1988) year old Nutone 9093N. The only difference is that the 9093WH has a night light that would require an extra wire from the switch to the fan. However, with the old switch and wiring, the plug (in the fan unit) fits and functions, lacking only power to the night light. Everything else works great, and the fan sounds wonderful. No change of housing or electrical installation necessary. I was looking at vent fan motor and heater fan motor replacement, plus overtemp fuse replacement in the old 9093N. This was the cost effective and easier fix!
customer_reviews.author: scrivener

customer_reviews.title: Same design 25 years on - Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these for 20+ years and it was getting very noisy. I only needed to replace the "moving" parts but I soon found that this would cost about $100 more than buying this complete new unit. Several people have commented on this web page that the new unit is 99% identical with the old one. Indeed, I very soon swapped out the working parts and now have a very quiet bathroom heater/extractor. The "internal" connector and wiring is exactly the same. The new unit comes with a new wall switch set that I have not installed yet but it appears to be a very simple job to do it.
customer_reviews.author: kenw

customer_reviews.title: Light shines where it shouldn't.
customer_reviews.text: The unit works well.........but, the thing I really am disappointed with is that after all of my great work to install it, when you put the light on it floods the internal workings of the exhaust/heater with light. To me it is disturbing that a company can ask top dollar for their product and not realize that through the R&D that this occurs. For most people I can imagine this wouldn't matter, but for meticulous consumers who take pride in their home it is like a slap in the face.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Boiler-plate replacement for a 30-year old unit!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! We had a vintage 1970's version of this unit installed in our basement bathroom ceiling, and it finally gave up the ghost. Bought this replacement. SAME PAN, SAME WIRING HARNESS!!! Unbolted the old, bolted in the new - installed in 5 minutes, and it works BEAUTIFULLY!!! And 80% quieter than the old unit! We were growing accustomed to that "DC-3 ready for take-off" sound... but no more! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rade Radosevich-Slay

customer_reviews.title: Great bathroom light / ventilation unit
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd unit. Our last one gave out after 10 years (I didnt do a good job of properly maintaining it.) This 2nd unit that I received from Amazon is quiter than the original I purchased and still seems to be well made with quality components. The heater function is great for when it's cold and the extractor fan perfect for the warmer times of year. The night light is also a nice feature for those midnight bathroom visits. 3 days into the new installation and it's humming along! A little pricey but worth it! You get what you pay for. 4.5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Muñoz

customer_reviews.title: Great features - fan, night light, light and heater in one!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this fan based on the bells and whistles it came with and it works just as described. I will say that it's large, so double check the measurements before you buy and it required being put on its own fuse in the fuse box (I had contractors install it so can't speak to how easy it was or wasn't to install) - price seems reasonable for everything it does and so far works well. I did want a noisier fan for privacy since my condo is small, and this does make a fair amount of noise so fits my needs nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Easy to Install (If Replacing Similar Existing Product)
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. If I didn't overthink it, I would have had it up in a matter of minutes. It replaced one that was in there since 1960, when the house was built. Gets good pull on the fan, so no more mildew or mold growing on the ceiling. Like others, I didn't hook up the nightlight, as 1) I would have had to run another wire and 2) nightlights are for babies.
customer_reviews.author: D.K. Brantley

customer_reviews.title: problems with 2 units so far
customer_reviews.text: I have received two units with problems so far-- The first kept blowing the GFCI breaker on the dedicated circuit for this fan/heater/light. I spent significant time troubleshooting the circuit and the issue was clearly caused by something in the unit--When I plugged the guts of another 9093WH fan into the housing, with the same house wiring, etc, the GFCI would no longer blow. The second doesn't have a GFCI problem, but the exhaust fan makes an intermittent squeaky noise. Other than that, the exhaust is OK for a 70 CFM fan, the night light is a nice feature, and the cats like the heater. I'll try one more time with another unit.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: We bought this in hopes of heating up the master ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in hopes of heating up the master bathroom during the winter time but have found this item to be extremely lacking in it's ability to warm even a few degrees above what we had before. The heating coil does turn orange but the heat blown down is not worth the cost of the item and the installation in retrospect.
customer_reviews.author: Michael stevens

customer_reviews.title: Big noise and low light lumen
customer_reviews.text: I installed it successfully. It means I couldn't return it now. I found the sound is very big and noisy. It was not comfortable at all. And the light is so dim and low. It was not comfortable to stay with it for taking a shower or toilet use. But I have no choice now. Give me a money back!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Original OEM replacement.  Quality and Function
customer_reviews.text: Exact OEM replacement. Includes all mounting hardware and internal components. Pricey but exact Braun replacement for four in one : exhaust fan. Heater. Night light. Light. Replaced 18 year old unit- expect same durability and quality. A little on the noisy side but the quality is worth it
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth B. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE:  hard to install and VERY noisy!
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice and works great, but electrician said was the hardest install he ever did, and at 3.5 sones, this is WAY too loud to sit in a bathtub and relax. And if you're talking to someone in the bathroom with this on, you can't hear the other person speak. I will be removing this unit when possible. It was too expensive for these deficits. If it was 2 sones or below it would have been worth it, no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie T

customer_reviews.title: good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for the original which is 30+ years old. It is quieter and vents and heats and light the space well, glad it was available
customer_reviews.author: Country Cousin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for 25 year old fan
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for my 25 year old fan of the same brand. A relief because or the round hole in bathroom and I was able to use the old mounting. Had to read wiring instructions closely because new model had night light and old one did not. I did not run new circuit for the night light just have one dummy switch.
customer_reviews.author: Fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Broan-NuTone 9093
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 50 year old unit that finally died- amazing that it is still being made I opted to replace the motor/fixture and the canister it sits in. Canister installation was a pain due to the framing in the ceiling and the limited ability to angle it in. New unit is silent as compared to the old one. heater works but don't expect it to heat the room.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D 3

customer_reviews.title: Heater failed after 10 months with low use.
customer_reviews.text: Order this unit in March 2018 and had it installed in April. Used the heater only several times since the weather was warming up. Started using the heater occasionally this Fall - now it's December and the heater has already failed. Ugh, now I have to have it removed.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer1

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could leave more than 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: My house is 42 years old, it was built with a Nutone heater/fan Model 9093. After 42 years the heater/fan died. I researched Nutone fans and from reading customer reviews it appeared a new Model 9093 would fit into the original housing with no problems. I removed the old unit, ordered the new one, when the new one arrived in 15 minutes I had the new one installed and working. Very quiet also. Could not be more pleased. I choose not to use the night light feature as that would require running an additional wire from the existing wall switch to the fan/heater/light. 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Marco Island

customer_reviews.title: Good Light
customer_reviews.text: Had this installed when we redid our bathroom, with the heat and fan, but after an about a year the fan is having trouble, takes time to get up to speed, but then works fine
customer_reviews.author: RDH

customer_reviews.title: New, improved and better than before.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 23 year old unit that had failed. This version has a fan that directs heated air downward - much better than previous version which had fan mounted horizontally. Also seems a bit quieter. Removal & replacement took about an hour. you will need a section of 4" flex duct and a clamp.
customer_reviews.author: LgR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for old model
customer_reviews.text: This relaxed what appeared to be the original 1960’s model that finally failed. Super easy to swap out. Literally took 15 minutes to get it out of the box, pull the old one and slide this one into place. Best parts are it finds quieter and more efficient and they have heat in the bathroom again.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: probably will need an electrician but it works great
customer_reviews.text: comes with all switches and everything you need. we used an electrician and it was a bit of a hassle to hang up. we needed drywall work after as well. however, the unit functions perfectly and looks much better than the old school round heaters. highly recommend for a bathroom upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: ccuster

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Ask for More
customer_reviews.text: Well, it was easy for our handyman to install. Works like a charm, heats a small bathroom quickly and as much as anyone could want. Read some complaints that you can look up into it and see some wires, probably you can, but that's kind of an odd thing to do. Looks very good to us.
customer_reviews.author: Loursat

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.  Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these to replace order ones from a 1984 reno. The new ones are even better. Offering 3 lighting options, heating and vent. All in one unit. Perfect!!! And the price here is much better than the big box stores. And the White option is great.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie B. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: ... this to replace the exact one that had gotten pretty loud when the vent was running
customer_reviews.text: I purcahsed this to replace the exact one that had gotten pretty loud when the vent was running. The motor or bearings were apparently going. 2 Screws, unplug the wiring harness, swing out the old interior and install the new guts! Easy-peasy. Good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn W. Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Exhaust Fan
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this for our bathroom, ours finally died. We did have to have an electrician come in and wire it...there are a lot of wires for all that it does. We were able to put it up ourselves. It is a nice exhaust fan and the night light is a bonus, we use it more than we thought we would. Patsy
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Great unit.
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit. I just bought this one to replace ours after 22 years of daily use. We did have to replace the heater component one other time about 10 years ago, but finally the heater gave out again followed by the vent. This is the primary source of heat in our bathroom and does a fine job, but we expect it to wear out after years of use from a family of 4. The heater is powerful, the vent works great, and we’ve never had any issues with the lights...the night night is a great feature too. Replacing just the working parts is quick and easy if the heater does malfunction after several years which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: TSH

customer_reviews.title: bigger than i thought
customer_reviews.text: love how it looks, but now need to add drywall to the space where it went/.//// complicated the job
customer_reviews.author: leeslearning

customer_reviews.title: wished I would have purchased the next size up
customer_reviews.text: great product, well made recommend hiring a professional to install (as I did) but wish I had purchased to bigger cfm model. Air blowing on a naked wet body needs to be super warm to be comfortable. Only sorry I did't install unit when I built my home 20 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Cocco Sr

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: The fan is very loud because it is so powerful. But, in my opinion, there is nothin better on the market. It looks great! It puts out a lot of heat for the the winter months. It is has good suction for ventilation. It is very attractive. It has a night lite. I bought this one as a replacement for the identical model installed over 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Nutone Keeps on Doing It.
customer_reviews.text: This was a exact replacement. Be cautious they are noisey, but then how often do you run them. Very well build and I used to replace a defective unit after 40 years.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Felsenthal

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but the heat is not very hot
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but the heat is not very hot. It does warm up the bathroom and makes your shower a little easier when you get out. But the ones I’ve experienced in the past were warmer air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The heat feature is very nice in the winter
customer_reviews.text: The heat feature is very nice in the winter. My parents have the older model in their bathrooms which is why I installed it. This newer model is so loud that we can not use it in the morning because it wakes up sleepers in adjoining room. The older model is not loud like this one. I would not buy it again for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Light, heat/fan in the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a NuTone bathroom fan. The old one we removed was from the 1980s, but the heating part was no longer working. The new fan fit in very well, connected up easily since the design has not changed. Now we can enjoy the warm air again.
customer_reviews.author: valmur

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't give off nearly as much heat as I expected. I expected it to at the least warm my 15' × 12' bathroom. But, no. I need to leave it on an hour before my bathroom is comfortable. I know I need the big picture window resealed, but it should take the chill off. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: US Person of Interest

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This combo heater/vent fan/light/night light was relatively easy to install and works well. The heater has a nice downdraft to put heat in the room, and the vent fan seems to move a sufficient quantity of air.
customer_reviews.author: Amzie

customer_reviews.title: Higher Quality Is Not Possible.
customer_reviews.text: I served in the military and have been a gearhead my whole life. I make many of the tools and appliances we use because civilian-grade simply doesn’t make sense to me. This fan works to perfection. Put LEDs in it and someone else will be turning it on in the morning to warm and de fog the bathroom a decade after you’re dead. (Tip: Buy it ‘open-box’.)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pragmatic

customer_reviews.title: Fan, heat, light replacement.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an existing unit with this one. Both had the same model numbers. Changes had been made to the unit, so although the size was the same, the internal parts were much different. Wiring was slightly different too. If you aren't familiar with electrical work you may need an electrician to wire it. After extracting the old fan I was able to install the new one in about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: removeb4flight

customer_reviews.title: Ripe-Off Dont Buy their Products.
customer_reviews.text: Unit was purchased on December 13th. Unit died. Called Broan - Nutone service and they said it's my problem. WHAT A RIP-OFF. DON"T BUY THERE PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.author: ronald schiller

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Fan Good heater
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, easy install. Overall quiet compared to many other units. We have this product in all our bathrooms. Lasts forever. Heater needed replacing, cheaper to but new unit then parts. Note, need to dust vents periodically, for best results. easy clean. Would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for a 9093N
customer_reviews.text: This took about 10 minutes with a screwdriver only. Left the old housing in place, unplugged the power clip in the housing, losened the unit retaining screws and the hinnged unit dropped and could be lifted out. Only diffences are that since I didn't rewire: no nightlight, new unit grill is white not chrome and grill screw slots are tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent combination unit. The vent / heater / light system all work very well. I would have given it 5 stars but the vent fan is pretty loud. But the light and heater is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: GunGuy

customer_reviews.title: I love this vent/light/heater!
customer_reviews.text: Although it is a bit noisy, this vent/light/heater works perfectly! I am particularly impressed with how quickly and effectively it heats the bathroom. We had a heater in the ceiling that was not a vent or light, so we were able to use the existing electrical box for the installation. I am very happy with this purchase and I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Encinas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more pleased! It's a "drop in" replacement for my 34 year old unit! It installed quickly and easily! I left the night light disconnected, since the power connector gave me exactly what I had before! The replacement took all of 20 minutes! Saved me from having to use an electrician and dealing with any drywall changes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is very well made.
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this product was that it fit perfect in the spot I needed it for. There is no down side for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ingoglia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The first one lasted 25 years. Thankfully they haven't changed them much since the original was installed so I was able to just put the new heater and light assembly into the old canister mounted in the ceiling. Hopefully I get another 25 years out of this one. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: MechaGodzilla

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I choose this one for our 2 baths for the noise level, heating capabilities and looks. Contractors said they were easy to install and they warm the rooms within 5 minutes. I turn it on, close the door and WaLa! Toasty. My other half is not healthy and always said "I'm so cold" after a shower. Since installing these, I have not heard that phrase. Ecstatic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!!!!  Older one is hotter, but this one is nice and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: My old one had a stronger heater. I'm guessing that the high heat was causing a safety concern. This one is still plenty warm enough and it's nice and quiet!!
customer_reviews.author: TheShaww

customer_reviews.title: Saved me a BIG bill to repair my old Nutone 9093.
customer_reviews.text: I used the guts of this unit to replace the guts of a 27 year old Nutone 9093 that had failed. Very easy to do. Two screws and a plug. An idiot could do it. Great price. Don't try to order the heat unit parts when your old 9093 fails. This is MUCH easier to do.
customer_reviews.author: Barry in MO

customer_reviews.title: Nice fans and lights.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace the exact same fan that we’ve had for 30 yrs. This is a great design and a very nice product. My husband installed it.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to install, it comes with everything you need except the tools. My home had this in it before it failed. With that being said, you should know that the old one was over 30 years old though! I did have to pull an extra wire for the new one because the old did not have a night light. all in all that was easy enough too. It's a great product and I really love the night light.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement, fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. Works very well. Only it came with that extra bluetooth feature that I do not need but if you want to throw in another cable for it, you have the option
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Verify the housing dimensions if you don't want to change the entire unit.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works but the dimensions are slightly smaller than the original I was replacing, Model 9093. The housing is about 1/4" larger making it difficult to simply replace the internal parts without modifying the fit.
customer_reviews.author: larry daniels

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Heavy duty fixture. Metal instead of plastic. Thought it was priced a little high but I would purchase it again because it is much better made than the plastic alternatives that are cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Robbye Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 at the same time..one broke after a few months and made a horrible noise ..
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Cook

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this multifunctional light.
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. It does everything it said it would do. Our bathroom was a little chilly and the heater is prefect on a cold winter night. I wish I would have bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Easy replacement
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item to replace an identical unit that was at least 25 yrs. old. Used the guts from the new unit to replace the old unit. Took 20 minutes to replace. The old unit had the same model number as the new unit. Thank you Nutone.
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: I love that it has a vent
customer_reviews.text: This is a large fan. I thought it was chrome by the picture but turns out it is white. I love that it has a vent, light, night light and a heater all in one. A bit cumbersome to do a self install, but needless to say it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, not too noisy. Came with switch. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This replaced our previous fan perfectly. It is so quiet and smooth. Works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is replacing an older model of itself. Love the fan, the heater and the high/low light options. A hugely great value at only $200...over $250 on other sites or in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: It is a little noisy but this thing puts out some heat. I love that it’s stylish and not the norm
customer_reviews.author: Farmhouse in the woods

customer_reviews.title: Not a good heater.
customer_reviews.text: Heater throws out cool heat air. Not anything like what I replaced that warmed and really heated my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: DHMS

customer_reviews.title: Hope it lasts for another 28 years!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as our old fan NuTone fan conked out after 28 years. We called the manufacturer and asked them a few questions about the specific model type. They were extremely knowledgeable and my husband was thrilled that the new fan was just like the new one and he was able to change it out in less than a half hour.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Replacement unit
customer_reviews.text: Replacement of our old unit after 10+ years, would replace with the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: QL

customer_reviews.title: What we didn't know
customer_reviews.text: These lights would have cost a lot of money to install. Sooo we had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalLin

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: A huge addition to our new bath. Don't know how we could have gone without it for so long in the old bath.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Page

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Replaced older model and this one works great. Powerful heating unit and fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does it all!
customer_reviews.text: All four functions work equally well. Warm air blower is an improvement to heat lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Very good unit to use in a small area where space is limited
customer_reviews.text: This is a very versatile unit in that it provides three functions in one unit. I'm using this unit in a small bathroom where ceiling space is limited.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy fit replacement for my 40 year old ceiling vent.
customer_reviews.author: Secord612

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a great price and work wonderfully. Had to replace an older version of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Twins

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a 23 year old vent fan perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This replaced the original unit that was installed in our house 23 years ago. It was a perfect drop in replacement, perfect mounting brackets, perfect fit into existing electronic plugs. It operates smoothly. I could not ask for an easier replacement fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, slim, easy install
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an older version that broke. This new updated unit is much better. It’s more slim and much quieter than the old one. The heater works great on cold mornings. Fairly easy to install yourself if you know somewhat what you’re doing.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: Happy they still make and sell this fan!
customer_reviews.text: So relieved that this same size fan is still on the market to replace the one installed 23 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J Millon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great in my bathrooms. Nice light, adequate heat. Low noise.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install - used to be better quality
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy install to replace an older one that was beyond it's useful life. The machine fit right in the can without modification. I am a little disappointed in the intermittent fan rattle. Although the made in China product fits the need, it is inferior to the earlier made in the USA product. Nutone has sacrificed quality to price/profit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Thum

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: My old fan/light/heater broke. It took a while and some careful measurements before I decided which fan to buy, but I bought the right one and it fit perfectly in the hole to replace the old one. I am happy!

customer_reviews.title: Super easy install and works great
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a 25 year old Nutone. It fit perfectly and no additional wiring was necessary since we didn't care about the night light. Super easy install and works great. We love the heat fan on those chilly mornings.

product_meta.title: Broan-NuTone 9093WH Exhaust Fan, Heater, and Light Combo, Bathroom Ceiling Heater, 1500-Watts, 70 CFM, White
product_meta.description:
Make sure your bathroom is toasty and comfortable in the morning with the NuTone White Exhaust Fan, Heater, and Light Combo. The fan vents moisture in bathrooms up to 65 sq. ft. to help prevent mildew from forming. It includes automatic-reset thermal protection and uses one 100-watt light and one 7-watt nightlight to provide a warm glow for nighttime use (bulbs sold separately). Its white grille helps provide a clean, decorative look for your bathroom. It includes a four-function wall switch to simplify controlling the fan. The NuTone White Exhaust Fan, Heater, and Light Combo is the perfect addition for your master, guest, or kid's bathroom.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
In the midst of the Great Depression, two aggressive young men emerged with two new products that would make major contributions to the housing industry. In 1932, Henry Broan developed and manufactured a kitchen fan called the Motordor Fan that provided quiet and efficient kitchen ventilation. His creation launched what is today known as Broan-NuTone LLC. Four years later, in 1936, J. Ralph Corbett developed a melodious door chime replacing the obnoxious door buzzer of the time. His development launched what is today known as NuTone, Inc. Both men, headquartered in the Midwest, started their companies with a simple product and a few employees. Each expanded their companies, creating revolutionary new products that provided unmatched conveniences for homeowners nationwide. Both companies quickly became global competitors and continued to provide innovative, superior products to meet the needs of consumers. In 1981, Broan Mfg. Co., Inc. was acquired by Nortek, Inc. and became the lead company of Nortek's Residential Building Products Group, which was named the Broan Group. During this same time period, NuTone was sold to Scovill Manufacturing in 1967 and was then acquired by Williams plc in 1991. In 1998, Nortek acquired NuTone, adding it to the Broan Group and renaming the group the Broan-NuTone Group. Then, in January 2000, Broan Mfg. Co., Inc. became Broan-NuTone LLC, with NuTone Inc., Aubrey Manufacturing, Inc. and Rangaire LP as subsidiaries. Today, Broan-NuTone LLC is headquartered in Hartford, Wis. and employs more than 3,200 people in eight countries on three continents. It is North America's largest producer of residential ventilation products such as range hoods, ventilation fans and indoor air quality products and also holds major market positions in chimes, central vacuums, intercom systems, medicine cabinets, built-in electric heaters, whole-house fans, attic ventilators, paddle fans, ironing centers, trash compactors and speakers.
feature_bullets: BATHROOM COMBO: Exhaust fan with heater and light combo powerful enough to heat rooms up to 65 sq. ft. Housing Dimensions- 13-1/4 x 13-1/4 x 7-1/2 inch
EASY TO USE: Four-function wall switch included so you have the right switch to control all functions right out of the box
QUICK INSTALLATION: Easy to install and/or replace an existing product for DIY'ers with included pieces
STRONG PERFORMANCE: 1500W heating element and 70CFM ventilation fan provide optimum performance at 3. 5, so you can have a touch of heat just when you need it without disturbing the whole house

DECORATIVE AND EFFECTIVE: Bright 100-Watt incandescent lighting provides clean, even light for pleasant surroundings and enough light to focus on the details. The 7-Watt nightlight provides a soft glow to light your bath during those nighttime visits. The white enamel grille is a suitable match for any decor, no matter how many times you change the paint color!
